module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AppIntegrationsConfiguration

-- | Configuration information for Amazon AppIntegrations to automatically
--   ingest content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAppIntegrationsConfiguration</a> smart constructor.
data AppIntegrationsConfiguration
AppIntegrationsConfiguration' :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> AppIntegrationsConfiguration

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppIntegrations DataIntegration
--   to use for ingesting content.
[$sel:appIntegrationArn:AppIntegrationsConfiguration'] :: AppIntegrationsConfiguration -> Text

-- | The fields from the source that are made available to your agents in
--   Wisdom.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>For <a>Salesforce</a>, you must include at least <tt>Id</tt>,
--   <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>, <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>,
--   <tt>PublishStatus</tt>, and <tt>IsDeleted</tt>.</li>
--   <li>For <a>ServiceNow</a>, you must include at least <tt>number</tt>,
--   <tt>short_description</tt>, <tt>sys_mod_count</tt>,
--   <tt>workflow_state</tt>, and <tt>active</tt>.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Make sure to include additional field(s); these are indexed and used
--   to source recommendations.
[$sel:objectFields:AppIntegrationsConfiguration'] :: AppIntegrationsConfiguration -> NonEmpty Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AppIntegrationsConfiguration</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--

--   fields.

--   Resource Name (ARN) of the AppIntegrations DataIntegration to use for
--   ingesting content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:objectFields:AppIntegrationsConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>appIntegrationsConfiguration_objectFields</a> - The fields from the
--   source that are made available to your agents in Wisdom.
--

--   <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>, <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>,

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentData

-- | Information about the content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContentData</a> smart constructor.
data ContentData
ContentData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> HashMap Text Text -> Text -> Text -> ContentStatus -> Text -> Sensitive Text -> POSIX -> ContentData

-- | The URI of the content.
[$sel:linkOutUri:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
[$sel:contentArn:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
[$sel:contentId:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The media type of the content.
[$sel:contentType:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
[$sel:metadata:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> HashMap Text Text

-- | The name of the content.
[$sel:name:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The identifier of the content revision.
[$sel:revisionId:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The status of the content.
[$sel:status:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> ContentStatus

-- | The title of the content.
[$sel:title:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The URL of the content.
[$sel:url:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Sensitive Text

-- | The expiration time of the URL as an epoch timestamp.
[$sel:urlExpiry:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>ContentData</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   <a>contentData_knowledgeBaseArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentData'</a>,
--   <a>contentData_knowledgeBaseId</a> - The the identifier of the
--   knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_metadata</a> - A
--   key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_name</a> - The name of
--   the content.
--

--   <a>$sel:status:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_status</a> - The
--   status of the content.

--   <a>$sel:title:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_title</a> - The title

--   content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:urlExpiry:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_urlExpiry</a> - The
--   expiration time of the URL as an epoch timestamp.

-- | The identifier of the content revision.

-- | The status of the content.

-- | The title of the content.

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary

-- | Summary information about the content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContentSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ContentSummary
ContentSummary' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> HashMap Text Text -> Text -> Text -> ContentStatus -> Text -> ContentSummary

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
[$sel:contentArn:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
[$sel:contentId:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The media type of the content.
[$sel:contentType:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
[$sel:metadata:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> HashMap Text Text

-- | The name of the content.
[$sel:name:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The identifier of the revision of the content.
[$sel:revisionId:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The status of the content.
[$sel:status:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> ContentStatus

-- | The title of the content.
[$sel:title:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ContentSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   <a>contentSummary_contentArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentId:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_contentId</a>
--   - The identifier of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentType:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_contentType</a> - The media type of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_knowledgeBaseArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_knowledgeBaseId</a> - The the identifier of the
--   knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_metadata</a> -
--   A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_name</a> - The
--   name of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:revisionId:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_revisionId</a> - The identifier of the revision of
--   the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_status</a> - The
--   status of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_title</a> - The
--   title of the content.
newContentSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> ContentStatus -> Text -> ContentSummary

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
contentSummary_tags :: Lens' ContentSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
contentSummary_contentArn :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
contentSummary_contentId :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The media type of the content.
contentSummary_contentType :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
contentSummary_knowledgeBaseArn :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
contentSummary_knowledgeBaseId :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
contentSummary_metadata :: Lens' ContentSummary (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The name of the content.
contentSummary_name :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The identifier of the revision of the content.
contentSummary_revisionId :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The status of the content.
contentSummary_status :: Lens' ContentSummary ContentStatus

-- | The title of the content.
contentSummary_title :: Lens' ContentSummary Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary.ContentSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary.ContentSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary.ContentSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary.ContentSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary.ContentSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary.ContentSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.ContentSummary.ContentSummary

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter

-- | A search filter.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFilter</a> smart constructor.
data Filter
Filter' :: FilterField -> FilterOperator -> Text -> Filter

-- | The field on which to filter.
[$sel:field:Filter'] :: Filter -> FilterField

-- | The operator to use for comparing the field’s value with the provided
--   value.
[$sel:operator:Filter'] :: Filter -> FilterOperator

-- | The desired field value on which to filter.
[$sel:value:Filter'] :: Filter -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Filter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:field:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_field</a> - The field on which to
--   filter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:operator:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_operator</a> - The operator to
--   use for comparing the field’s value with the provided value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_value</a> - The desired field
--   value on which to filter.
newFilter :: FilterField -> FilterOperator -> Text -> Filter

-- | The field on which to filter.
filter_field :: Lens' Filter FilterField

-- | The operator to use for comparing the field’s value with the provided
--   value.
filter_operator :: Lens' Filter FilterOperator

-- | The desired field value on which to filter.
filter_value :: Lens' Filter Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter.Filter
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter.Filter
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter.Filter
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter.Filter
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter.Filter
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter.Filter
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Filter.Filter


module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight

-- | Offset specification to describe highlighting of document excerpts for
--   rendering search results and recommendations.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newHighlight</a> smart constructor.
data Highlight
Highlight' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Highlight

-- | The offset for the end of the highlight.
[$sel:endOffsetExclusive:Highlight'] :: Highlight -> Maybe Int

-- | The offset for the start of the highlight.
[$sel:beginOffsetInclusive:Highlight'] :: Highlight -> Maybe Int

-- | Create a value of <a>Highlight</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:endOffsetExclusive:Highlight'</a>,
--   <a>highlight_endOffsetExclusive</a> - The offset for the end of the
--   highlight.
--   
--   <a>$sel:beginOffsetInclusive:Highlight'</a>,
--   <a>highlight_beginOffsetInclusive</a> - The offset for the start of
--   the highlight.
newHighlight :: Highlight

-- | The offset for the end of the highlight.
highlight_endOffsetExclusive :: Lens' Highlight (Maybe Int)

-- | The offset for the start of the highlight.
highlight_beginOffsetInclusive :: Lens' Highlight (Maybe Int)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight.Highlight
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight.Highlight
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight.Highlight
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight.Highlight
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight.Highlight
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight.Highlight
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Highlight.Highlight

--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDocumentText</a> smart constructor.

[$sel:highlights:DocumentText'] :: DocumentText -> Maybe [Highlight]

--   omitted.

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   document.
--   
--   <a>$sel:highlights:DocumentText'</a>, <a>documentText_highlights</a> -
--   Highlights in the document text.
newDocumentText :: DocumentText

-- | Highlights in the document text.

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.Document

-- | The document.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDocument</a> smart constructor.
data Document

-- | The excerpt from the document.
[$sel:excerpt:Document'] :: Document -> Maybe DocumentText

-- | The title of the document.
[$sel:title:Document'] :: Document -> Maybe DocumentText

-- | A reference to the content resource.
[$sel:contentReference:Document'] :: Document -> ContentReference

-- | Create a value of <a>Document</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:excerpt:Document'</a>, <a>document_excerpt</a> - The excerpt
--   from the document.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:Document'</a>, <a>document_title</a> - The title of the
--   document.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentReference:Document'</a>,
--   <a>document_contentReference</a> - A reference to the content
--   resource.
newDocument :: ContentReference -> Document

-- | The excerpt from the document.
document_excerpt :: Lens' Document (Maybe DocumentText)

-- | The title of the document.
document_title :: Lens' Document (Maybe DocumentText)

-- | A reference to the content resource.
document_contentReference :: Lens' Document ContentReference

--   identifier of the assistant association.

--   Wisdom assistant.

--   data.

--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssistantAssociationData</a> smart constructor.
data AssistantAssociationData

--   ID.

--   Resource Name (ARN) of the assistant association.

--   <a>$sel:assistantAssociationId:AssistantAssociationData'</a>,

--   identifier of the assistant association.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assistantId:AssistantAssociationData'</a>,

--   Wisdom assistant.
--

--   association.

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus
newtype KnowledgeBaseStatus
KnowledgeBaseStatus' :: Text -> KnowledgeBaseStatus
[fromKnowledgeBaseStatus] :: KnowledgeBaseStatus -> Text
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_ACTIVE :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_CREATE_FAILED :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_CREATE_IN_PROGRESS :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_DELETED :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_DELETE_FAILED :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_DELETE_IN_PROGRESS :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.XML.ToXML Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.XML.FromXML Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Headers.ToHeader Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Log.ToLog Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Text.ToText Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Text.FromText Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseStatus.KnowledgeBaseStatus

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError

-- | An error occurred when creating a recommendation.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNotifyRecommendationsReceivedError</a> smart
--   constructor.
data NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError
NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError

-- | The identifier of the recommendation that is in error.
[$sel:recommendationId:NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError'] :: NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError -> Maybe Text

-- | A recommendation is causing an error.
[$sel:message:NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError'] :: NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendationId:NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError'</a>,
--   <a>notifyRecommendationsReceivedError_recommendationId</a> - The
--   identifier of the recommendation that is in error.
--   
--   <a>$sel:message:NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError'</a>,
--   <a>notifyRecommendationsReceivedError_message</a> - A recommendation
--   is causing an error.
newNotifyRecommendationsReceivedError :: NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError

-- | The identifier of the recommendation that is in error.
notifyRecommendationsReceivedError_recommendationId :: Lens' NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError (Maybe Text)

-- | A recommendation is causing an error.
notifyRecommendationsReceivedError_message :: Lens' NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError.NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError.NotifyRecommendationsReceivedError

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RecommendationData

-- | Information about the recommendation.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRecommendationData</a> smart constructor.
data RecommendationData
RecommendationData' :: Maybe RelevanceLevel -> Maybe Double -> Document -> Text -> RecommendationData

-- | The relevance level of the recommendation.
[$sel:relevanceLevel:RecommendationData'] :: RecommendationData -> Maybe RelevanceLevel

-- | The relevance score of the recommendation.
[$sel:relevanceScore:RecommendationData'] :: RecommendationData -> Maybe Double

-- | The recommended document.
[$sel:document:RecommendationData'] :: RecommendationData -> Document

-- | The identifier of the recommendation.
[$sel:recommendationId:RecommendationData'] :: RecommendationData -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>RecommendationData</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   recommendation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:relevanceScore:RecommendationData'</a>,
--   <a>recommendationData_relevanceScore</a> - The relevance score of the
--   recommendation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:document:RecommendationData'</a>,
--   <a>recommendationData_document</a> - The recommended document.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendationId:RecommendationData'</a>,
--   <a>recommendationData_recommendationId</a> - The identifier of the
--   recommendation.
newRecommendationData :: Document -> Text -> RecommendationData

-- | The relevance level of the recommendation.
recommendationData_relevanceLevel :: Lens' RecommendationData (Maybe RelevanceLevel)

-- | The relevance score of the recommendation.
recommendationData_relevanceScore :: Lens' RecommendationData (Maybe Double)

-- | The recommended document.
recommendationData_document :: Lens' RecommendationData Document

-- | The identifier of the recommendation.
recommendationData_recommendationId :: Lens' RecommendationData Text

instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RecommendationData.RecommendationData
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RecommendationData.RecommendationData


module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration

-- | Information about how to render the content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRenderingConfiguration</a> smart constructor.
data RenderingConfiguration
RenderingConfiguration' :: Maybe Text -> RenderingConfiguration

-- | A URI template containing exactly one variable in <tt>${variableName}
--   </tt>format. This can only be set for <tt>EXTERNAL</tt> knowledge
--   bases. For Salesforce and ServiceNow, the variable must be one of the
--   following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Salesforce: <tt>Id</tt>, <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>, <tt>PublishStatus</tt>, or
--   <tt>IsDeleted</tt></li>
--   <li>ServiceNow: <tt>number</tt>, <tt>short_description</tt>,
--   <tt>sys_mod_count</tt>, <tt>workflow_state</tt>, or
--   <tt>active</tt></li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <pre>
--   &lt;p&gt;The variable is replaced with the actual value for a piece of content when calling &lt;a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wisdom/latest/APIReference/API_GetContent.html"&gt;GetContent&lt;/a&gt;. &lt;/p&gt;
--   </pre>
[$sel:templateUri:RenderingConfiguration'] :: RenderingConfiguration -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>RenderingConfiguration</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:templateUri:RenderingConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>renderingConfiguration_templateUri</a> - A URI template containing
--   exactly one variable in <tt>${variableName} </tt>format. This can only
--   be set for <tt>EXTERNAL</tt> knowledge bases. For Salesforce and
--   ServiceNow, the variable must be one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Salesforce: <tt>Id</tt>, <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>, <tt>PublishStatus</tt>, or
--   <tt>IsDeleted</tt></li>
--   <li>ServiceNow: <tt>number</tt>, <tt>short_description</tt>,
--   <tt>sys_mod_count</tt>, <tt>workflow_state</tt>, or
--   <tt>active</tt></li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <pre>
--   &lt;p&gt;The variable is replaced with the actual value for a piece of content when calling &lt;a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wisdom/latest/APIReference/API_GetContent.html"&gt;GetContent&lt;/a&gt;. &lt;/p&gt;
--   </pre>
newRenderingConfiguration :: RenderingConfiguration

-- | A URI template containing exactly one variable in <tt>${variableName}
--   </tt>format. This can only be set for <tt>EXTERNAL</tt> knowledge
--   bases. For Salesforce and ServiceNow, the variable must be one of the
--   following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Salesforce: <tt>Id</tt>, <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>, <tt>PublishStatus</tt>, or
--   <tt>IsDeleted</tt></li>
--   <li>ServiceNow: <tt>number</tt>, <tt>short_description</tt>,
--   <tt>sys_mod_count</tt>, <tt>workflow_state</tt>, or
--   <tt>active</tt></li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <pre>
--   &lt;p&gt;The variable is replaced with the actual value for a piece of content when calling &lt;a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wisdom/latest/APIReference/API_GetContent.html"&gt;GetContent&lt;/a&gt;. &lt;/p&gt;
--   </pre>
renderingConfiguration_templateUri :: Lens' RenderingConfiguration (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.RenderingConfiguration.RenderingConfiguration

--   Guide</i>.

--   information about valid ID values, see <a>Key identifiers (KeyId)</a>
--   in the <i>AWS Key Management Service Developer Guide</i>.

-- | The KMS key. For information about valid ID values, see <a>Key
--   identifiers (KeyId)</a> in the <i>AWS Key Management Service Developer
--   Guide</i>.

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary

-- | Summary information about the assistant.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssistantSummary</a> smart constructor.
data AssistantSummary
AssistantSummary' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> AssistantStatus -> AssistantType -> AssistantSummary

-- | The description of the assistant.
[$sel:description:AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
[$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom assistant
[$sel:assistantArn:AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> Text

-- | The identifier of the Wisdom assistant.
[$sel:assistantId:AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> Text

-- | The name of the assistant.
[$sel:name:AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> Text

-- | The status of the assistant.
[$sel:status:AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> AssistantStatus

-- | The type of the assistant.
[$sel:type':AssistantSummary'] :: AssistantSummary -> AssistantType

-- | Create a value of <a>AssistantSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssistantSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assistantSummary_description</a> - The description of the
--   assistant.
--   
--   <a>$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:AssistantSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assistantSummary_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration</a> - The KMS
--   key used for encryption.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:AssistantSummary'</a>, <a>assistantSummary_tags</a> - The
--   tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assistantArn:AssistantSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assistantSummary_assistantArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   of the Wisdom assistant
--   
--   <a>$sel:assistantId:AssistantSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assistantSummary_assistantId</a> - The identifier of the Wisdom
--   assistant.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssistantSummary'</a>, <a>assistantSummary_name</a> - The
--   name of the assistant.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssistantSummary'</a>, <a>assistantSummary_status</a> -
--   The status of the assistant.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':AssistantSummary'</a>, <a>assistantSummary_type</a> -
--   The type of the assistant.
newAssistantSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> AssistantStatus -> AssistantType -> AssistantSummary

-- | The description of the assistant.
assistantSummary_description :: Lens' AssistantSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
assistantSummary_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration :: Lens' AssistantSummary (Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration)

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
assistantSummary_tags :: Lens' AssistantSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom assistant
assistantSummary_assistantArn :: Lens' AssistantSummary Text

-- | The identifier of the Wisdom assistant.
assistantSummary_assistantId :: Lens' AssistantSummary Text

-- | The name of the assistant.
assistantSummary_name :: Lens' AssistantSummary Text

-- | The status of the assistant.
assistantSummary_status :: Lens' AssistantSummary AssistantStatus

-- | The type of the assistant.
assistantSummary_type :: Lens' AssistantSummary AssistantType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary.AssistantSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary.AssistantSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary.AssistantSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary.AssistantSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary.AssistantSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary.AssistantSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantSummary.AssistantSummary


module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData

-- | The assistant data.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssistantData</a> smart constructor.
data AssistantData
AssistantData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> AssistantStatus -> AssistantType -> AssistantData

-- | The description.
[$sel:description:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Maybe Text

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
[$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom assistant
[$sel:assistantArn:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Text

-- | The identifier of the Wisdom assistant.
[$sel:assistantId:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Text

-- | The name.
[$sel:name:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Text

-- | The status of the assistant.
[$sel:status:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> AssistantStatus

-- | The type of assistant.
[$sel:type':AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> AssistantType

-- | Create a value of <a>AssistantData</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssistantData'</a>,
--   <a>assistantData_description</a> - The description.
--   
--   <a>$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:AssistantData'</a>,
--   <a>assistantData_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration</a> - The KMS key
--   used for encryption.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:AssistantData'</a>, <a>assistantData_tags</a> - The tags
--   used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assistantArn:AssistantData'</a>,
--   <a>assistantData_assistantArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the Wisdom assistant
--   
--   <a>$sel:assistantId:AssistantData'</a>,
--   <a>assistantData_assistantId</a> - The identifier of the Wisdom
--   assistant.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssistantData'</a>, <a>assistantData_name</a> - The name.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssistantData'</a>, <a>assistantData_status</a> - The
--   status of the assistant.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':AssistantData'</a>, <a>assistantData_type</a> - The type
--   of assistant.
newAssistantData :: Text -> Text -> Text -> AssistantStatus -> AssistantType -> AssistantData

-- | The description.
assistantData_description :: Lens' AssistantData (Maybe Text)

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
assistantData_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration :: Lens' AssistantData (Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration)

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
assistantData_tags :: Lens' AssistantData (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom assistant
assistantData_assistantArn :: Lens' AssistantData Text

-- | The identifier of the Wisdom assistant.
assistantData_assistantId :: Lens' AssistantData Text

-- | The name.
assistantData_name :: Lens' AssistantData Text

-- | The status of the assistant.
assistantData_status :: Lens' AssistantData AssistantStatus

-- | The type of assistant.
assistantData_type :: Lens' AssistantData AssistantType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData.AssistantData
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData.AssistantData
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData.AssistantData
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData.AssistantData
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData.AssistantData
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData.AssistantData
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.AssistantData.AssistantData


module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.SessionData

--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSessionData</a> smart constructor.
data SessionData
SessionData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> SessionData

-- | The description of the session.
[$sel:description:SessionData'] :: SessionData -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the session.

module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary

-- | Summary information about the knowledge base.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newKnowledgeBaseSummary</a> smart constructor.
data KnowledgeBaseSummary
KnowledgeBaseSummary' :: Maybe RenderingConfiguration -> Maybe SourceConfiguration -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseType -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseStatus -> KnowledgeBaseSummary

-- | Information about how to render the content.
[$sel:renderingConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Maybe RenderingConfiguration

-- | <ul>
--   <li><i>KEVIN</i></li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:sourceConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Maybe SourceConfiguration

-- | The description of the knowledge base.
[$sel:description:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
[$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseId:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Text

-- | The type of knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseType:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> KnowledgeBaseType

-- | The name of the knowledge base.
[$sel:name:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> Text

-- | The status of the knowledge base summary.
[$sel:status:KnowledgeBaseSummary'] :: KnowledgeBaseSummary -> KnowledgeBaseStatus

-- | Create a value of <a>KnowledgeBaseSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:renderingConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_renderingConfiguration</a> - Information about
--   how to render the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_sourceConfiguration</a> - [KEVIN]
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_description</a> - The description of the
--   knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration</a> - The
--   KMS key used for encryption.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_tags</a> - The tags used to organize, track,
--   or control access for this resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_knowledgeBaseArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseId:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_knowledgeBaseId</a> - The the identifier of
--   the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseType:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_knowledgeBaseType</a> - The type of knowledge
--   base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_name</a> - The name of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:KnowledgeBaseSummary'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseSummary_status</a> - The status of the knowledge base
--   summary.
newKnowledgeBaseSummary :: Text -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseType -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseStatus -> KnowledgeBaseSummary

-- | Information about how to render the content.
knowledgeBaseSummary_renderingConfiguration :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary (Maybe RenderingConfiguration)

-- | <ul>
--   <li><i>KEVIN</i></li>
--   </ul>
knowledgeBaseSummary_sourceConfiguration :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary (Maybe SourceConfiguration)

-- | The description of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseSummary_description :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
knowledgeBaseSummary_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary (Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration)

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
knowledgeBaseSummary_tags :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseSummary_knowledgeBaseArn :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseSummary_knowledgeBaseId :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary Text

-- | The type of knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseSummary_knowledgeBaseType :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary KnowledgeBaseType

-- | The name of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseSummary_name :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary Text

-- | The status of the knowledge base summary.
knowledgeBaseSummary_status :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseSummary KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary.KnowledgeBaseSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary.KnowledgeBaseSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary.KnowledgeBaseSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary.KnowledgeBaseSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary.KnowledgeBaseSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary.KnowledgeBaseSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseSummary.KnowledgeBaseSummary


module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData

-- | Information about the knowledge base.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newKnowledgeBaseData</a> smart constructor.
data KnowledgeBaseData
KnowledgeBaseData' :: Maybe RenderingConfiguration -> Maybe SourceConfiguration -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseType -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseStatus -> KnowledgeBaseData

-- | Information about how to render the content.
[$sel:renderingConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Maybe RenderingConfiguration

-- | Source configuration information about the knowledge base.
[$sel:sourceConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Maybe SourceConfiguration

-- | An epoch timestamp indicating the most recent content modification
--   inside the knowledge base. If no content exists in a knowledge base,
--   this value is unset.
[$sel:lastContentModificationTime:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The description.
[$sel:description:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Maybe Text

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
[$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseId:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Text

-- | The type of knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseType:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> KnowledgeBaseType

-- | The name of the knowledge base.
[$sel:name:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> Text

-- | The status of the knowledge base.
[$sel:status:KnowledgeBaseData'] :: KnowledgeBaseData -> KnowledgeBaseStatus

-- | Create a value of <a>KnowledgeBaseData</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:renderingConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_renderingConfiguration</a> - Information about
--   how to render the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_sourceConfiguration</a> - Source configuration
--   information about the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastContentModificationTime:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_lastContentModificationTime</a> - An epoch
--   timestamp indicating the most recent content modification inside the
--   knowledge base. If no content exists in a knowledge base, this value
--   is unset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_description</a> - The description.
--   
--   <a>$sel:serverSideEncryptionConfiguration:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration</a> - The KMS
--   key used for encryption.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>, <a>knowledgeBaseData_tags</a> -
--   The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_knowledgeBaseArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseId:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_knowledgeBaseId</a> - The the identifier of the
--   knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseType:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>,
--   <a>knowledgeBaseData_knowledgeBaseType</a> - The type of knowledge
--   base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>, <a>knowledgeBaseData_name</a> -
--   The name of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:KnowledgeBaseData'</a>, <a>knowledgeBaseData_status</a>
--   - The status of the knowledge base.
newKnowledgeBaseData :: Text -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseType -> Text -> KnowledgeBaseStatus -> KnowledgeBaseData

-- | Information about how to render the content.
knowledgeBaseData_renderingConfiguration :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData (Maybe RenderingConfiguration)

-- | Source configuration information about the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseData_sourceConfiguration :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData (Maybe SourceConfiguration)

-- | An epoch timestamp indicating the most recent content modification
--   inside the knowledge base. If no content exists in a knowledge base,
--   this value is unset.
knowledgeBaseData_lastContentModificationTime :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The description.
knowledgeBaseData_description :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData (Maybe Text)

-- | The KMS key used for encryption.
knowledgeBaseData_serverSideEncryptionConfiguration :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData (Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration)

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
knowledgeBaseData_tags :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseData_knowledgeBaseArn :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseData_knowledgeBaseId :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData Text

-- | The type of knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseData_knowledgeBaseType :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData KnowledgeBaseType

-- | The name of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseData_name :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData Text

-- | The status of the knowledge base.
knowledgeBaseData_status :: Lens' KnowledgeBaseData KnowledgeBaseStatus
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData.KnowledgeBaseData
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData.KnowledgeBaseData
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData.KnowledgeBaseData
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData.KnowledgeBaseData
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData.KnowledgeBaseData
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData.KnowledgeBaseData
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Wisdom.Types.KnowledgeBaseData.KnowledgeBaseData


module Amazonka.Wisdom.Types

-- | API version <tt>2020-10-19</tt> of the Amazon Connect Wisdom Service
--   SDK configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | The input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by an AWS
--   service.
_ValidationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | You do not have sufficient access to perform this action.
_AccessDeniedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The provided <tt>revisionId</tt> does not match, indicating the
--   content has been modified since it was last read.
_PreconditionFailedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Amazon Connect Wisdom throws this exception if you have too many tags
--   in your tag set.
_TooManyTagsException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request could not be processed because of conflict in the current
--   state of the resource. For example, if you're using a <tt>Create</tt>
--   API (such as <tt>CreateAssistant</tt>) that accepts name, a
--   conflicting resource (usually with the same name) is being created or
--   mutated.
_ConflictException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | You've exceeded your service quota. To perform the requested action,
--   remove some of the relevant resources, or use service quotas to
--   request a service quota increase.
_ServiceQuotaExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The specified resource does not exist.
_ResourceNotFoundException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError
newtype AssistantStatus
AssistantStatus' :: Text -> AssistantStatus
[fromAssistantStatus] :: AssistantStatus -> Text
pattern AssistantStatus_ACTIVE :: AssistantStatus
pattern AssistantStatus_CREATE_FAILED :: AssistantStatus
pattern AssistantStatus_CREATE_IN_PROGRESS :: AssistantStatus
pattern AssistantStatus_DELETED :: AssistantStatus
pattern AssistantStatus_DELETE_FAILED :: AssistantStatus
pattern AssistantStatus_DELETE_IN_PROGRESS :: AssistantStatus
newtype AssistantType
AssistantType' :: Text -> AssistantType
[fromAssistantType] :: AssistantType -> Text
pattern AssistantType_AGENT :: AssistantType
newtype AssociationType
AssociationType' :: Text -> AssociationType
[fromAssociationType] :: AssociationType -> Text
pattern AssociationType_KNOWLEDGE_BASE :: AssociationType
newtype ContentStatus
ContentStatus' :: Text -> ContentStatus
[fromContentStatus] :: ContentStatus -> Text
pattern ContentStatus_ACTIVE :: ContentStatus
pattern ContentStatus_CREATE_FAILED :: ContentStatus
pattern ContentStatus_CREATE_IN_PROGRESS :: ContentStatus
pattern ContentStatus_DELETED :: ContentStatus
pattern ContentStatus_DELETE_FAILED :: ContentStatus
pattern ContentStatus_DELETE_IN_PROGRESS :: ContentStatus
pattern ContentStatus_UPDATE_FAILED :: ContentStatus
newtype FilterField
FilterField' :: Text -> FilterField
[fromFilterField] :: FilterField -> Text
pattern FilterField_NAME :: FilterField
newtype FilterOperator
FilterOperator' :: Text -> FilterOperator
[fromFilterOperator] :: FilterOperator -> Text
pattern FilterOperator_EQUALS :: FilterOperator
newtype KnowledgeBaseStatus
KnowledgeBaseStatus' :: Text -> KnowledgeBaseStatus
[fromKnowledgeBaseStatus] :: KnowledgeBaseStatus -> Text
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_ACTIVE :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_CREATE_FAILED :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_CREATE_IN_PROGRESS :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_DELETED :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_DELETE_FAILED :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
pattern KnowledgeBaseStatus_DELETE_IN_PROGRESS :: KnowledgeBaseStatus
newtype KnowledgeBaseType
KnowledgeBaseType' :: Text -> KnowledgeBaseType
[fromKnowledgeBaseType] :: KnowledgeBaseType -> Text
pattern KnowledgeBaseType_CUSTOM :: KnowledgeBaseType
pattern KnowledgeBaseType_EXTERNAL :: KnowledgeBaseType
newtype RelevanceLevel
RelevanceLevel' :: Text -> RelevanceLevel
[fromRelevanceLevel] :: RelevanceLevel -> Text
pattern RelevanceLevel_HIGH :: RelevanceLevel
pattern RelevanceLevel_LOW :: RelevanceLevel
pattern RelevanceLevel_MEDIUM :: RelevanceLevel

-- | Configuration information for Amazon AppIntegrations to automatically
--   ingest content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAppIntegrationsConfiguration</a> smart constructor.
data AppIntegrationsConfiguration
AppIntegrationsConfiguration' :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> AppIntegrationsConfiguration

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppIntegrations DataIntegration
--   to use for ingesting content.
[$sel:appIntegrationArn:AppIntegrationsConfiguration'] :: AppIntegrationsConfiguration -> Text

-- | The fields from the source that are made available to your agents in
--   Wisdom.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>For <a>Salesforce</a>, you must include at least <tt>Id</tt>,
--   <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>, <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>,
--   <tt>PublishStatus</tt>, and <tt>IsDeleted</tt>.</li>
--   <li>For <a>ServiceNow</a>, you must include at least <tt>number</tt>,
--   <tt>short_description</tt>, <tt>sys_mod_count</tt>,
--   <tt>workflow_state</tt>, and <tt>active</tt>.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Make sure to include additional field(s); these are indexed and used
--   to source recommendations.
[$sel:objectFields:AppIntegrationsConfiguration'] :: AppIntegrationsConfiguration -> NonEmpty Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AppIntegrationsConfiguration</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:appIntegrationArn:AppIntegrationsConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>appIntegrationsConfiguration_appIntegrationArn</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the AppIntegrations DataIntegration to use for
--   ingesting content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:objectFields:AppIntegrationsConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>appIntegrationsConfiguration_objectFields</a> - The fields from the
--   source that are made available to your agents in Wisdom.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>For <a>Salesforce</a>, you must include at least <tt>Id</tt>,
--   <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>, <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>,
--   <tt>PublishStatus</tt>, and <tt>IsDeleted</tt>.</li>
--   <li>For <a>ServiceNow</a>, you must include at least <tt>number</tt>,
--   <tt>short_description</tt>, <tt>sys_mod_count</tt>,
--   <tt>workflow_state</tt>, and <tt>active</tt>.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Make sure to include additional field(s); these are indexed and used
--   to source recommendations.
newAppIntegrationsConfiguration :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> AppIntegrationsConfiguration

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppIntegrations DataIntegration
--   to use for ingesting content.
appIntegrationsConfiguration_appIntegrationArn :: Lens' AppIntegrationsConfiguration Text

-- | The fields from the source that are made available to your agents in
--   Wisdom.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>For <a>Salesforce</a>, you must include at least <tt>Id</tt>,
--   <tt>ArticleNumber</tt>, <tt>VersionNumber</tt>, <tt>Title</tt>,
--   <tt>PublishStatus</tt>, and <tt>IsDeleted</tt>.</li>
--   <li>For <a>ServiceNow</a>, you must include at least <tt>number</tt>,
--   <tt>short_description</tt>, <tt>sys_mod_count</tt>,
--   <tt>workflow_state</tt>, and <tt>active</tt>.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Make sure to include additional field(s); these are indexed and used
--   to source recommendations.
appIntegrationsConfiguration_objectFields :: Lens' AppIntegrationsConfiguration (NonEmpty Text)

-- | Information about the assistant association.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssistantAssociationData</a> smart constructor.
data AssistantAssociationData
AssistantAssociationData' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> AssistantAssociationOutputData -> AssociationType -> AssistantAssociationData

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.

--   ID.

-- | The assistant data.

data AssistantData
AssistantData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> AssistantStatus -> AssistantType -> AssistantData

[$sel:assistantArn:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Text

[$sel:name:AssistantData'] :: AssistantData -> Text

--

-- | Information about the content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContentData</a> smart constructor.
data ContentData
ContentData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> HashMap Text Text -> Text -> Text -> ContentStatus -> Text -> Sensitive Text -> POSIX -> ContentData

-- | The URI of the content.
[$sel:linkOutUri:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
[$sel:contentArn:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
[$sel:contentId:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The media type of the content.
[$sel:contentType:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
[$sel:metadata:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> HashMap Text Text

-- | The name of the content.
[$sel:name:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The identifier of the content revision.
[$sel:revisionId:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The status of the content.
[$sel:status:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> ContentStatus

-- | The title of the content.
[$sel:title:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Text

-- | The URL of the content.
[$sel:url:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> Sensitive Text

-- | The expiration time of the URL as an epoch timestamp.
[$sel:urlExpiry:ContentData'] :: ContentData -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>ContentData</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:linkOutUri:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_linkOutUri</a> -
--   The URI of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_tags</a> - The tags used
--   to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentArn:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_contentArn</a> -
--   The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentId:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_contentId</a> - The
--   identifier of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentType:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_contentType</a> -
--   The media type of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentData'</a>,
--   <a>contentData_knowledgeBaseArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentData'</a>,
--   <a>contentData_knowledgeBaseId</a> - The the identifier of the
--   knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_metadata</a> - A
--   key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_name</a> - The name of
--   the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:revisionId:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_revisionId</a> -
--   The identifier of the content revision.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_status</a> - The
--   status of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_title</a> - The title
--   of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:url:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_url</a> - The URL of the
--   content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:urlExpiry:ContentData'</a>, <a>contentData_urlExpiry</a> - The
--   expiration time of the URL as an epoch timestamp.
newContentData :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> ContentStatus -> Text -> Text -> UTCTime -> ContentData

-- | The URI of the content.
contentData_linkOutUri :: Lens' ContentData (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
contentData_tags :: Lens' ContentData (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
contentData_contentArn :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
contentData_contentId :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The media type of the content.
contentData_contentType :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
contentData_knowledgeBaseArn :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
contentData_knowledgeBaseId :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
contentData_metadata :: Lens' ContentData (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The name of the content.
contentData_name :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The identifier of the content revision.
contentData_revisionId :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The status of the content.
contentData_status :: Lens' ContentData ContentStatus

-- | The title of the content.
contentData_title :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The URL of the content.
contentData_url :: Lens' ContentData Text

-- | The expiration time of the URL as an epoch timestamp.
contentData_urlExpiry :: Lens' ContentData UTCTime

-- | Reference information about the content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContentReference</a> smart constructor.
data ContentReference

[$sel:contentArn:ContentReference'] :: ContentReference -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
[$sel:contentId:ContentReference'] :: ContentReference -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentReference'] :: ContentReference -> Maybe Text

[$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentReference'] :: ContentReference -> Maybe Text

--   omitted.

contentReference_knowledgeBaseId :: Lens' ContentReference (Maybe Text)

-- | Summary information about the content.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContentSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ContentSummary
ContentSummary' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> HashMap Text Text -> Text -> Text -> ContentStatus -> Text -> ContentSummary

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
[$sel:tags:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
[$sel:contentArn:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
[$sel:contentId:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The media type of the content.
[$sel:contentType:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
[$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
[$sel:metadata:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> HashMap Text Text

-- | The name of the content.
[$sel:name:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The identifier of the revision of the content.
[$sel:revisionId:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | The status of the content.
[$sel:status:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> ContentStatus

-- | The title of the content.
[$sel:title:ContentSummary'] :: ContentSummary -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ContentSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_tags</a> - The
--   tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentArn:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_contentArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentId:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_contentId</a>
--   - The identifier of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentType:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_contentType</a> - The media type of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseArn:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_knowledgeBaseArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:knowledgeBaseId:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_knowledgeBaseId</a> - The the identifier of the
--   knowledge base.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_metadata</a> -
--   A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_name</a> - The
--   name of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:revisionId:ContentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>contentSummary_revisionId</a> - The identifier of the revision of
--   the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_status</a> - The
--   status of the content.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:ContentSummary'</a>, <a>contentSummary_title</a> - The
--   title of the content.
newContentSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> ContentStatus -> Text -> ContentSummary

-- | The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.
contentSummary_tags :: Lens' ContentSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.
contentSummary_contentArn :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The identifier of the content.
contentSummary_contentId :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The media type of the content.
contentSummary_contentType :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.
contentSummary_knowledgeBaseArn :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The the identifier of the knowledge base.
contentSummary_knowledgeBaseId :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | A key/value map to store attributes without affecting tagging or
--   recommendations. For example, when synchronizing data between an
--   external system and Wisdom, you can store an external version
--   identifier as metadata to utilize for determining drift.
contentSummary_metadata :: Lens' ContentSummary (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The name of the content.
contentSummary_name :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The identifier of the revision of the content.
contentSummary_revisionId :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The status of the content.
contentSummary_status :: Lens' ContentSummary ContentStatus

-- | The title of the content.
contentSummary_title :: Lens' ContentSummary Text

-- | The document.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDocument</a> smart constructor.
data Document
Document' :: Maybe DocumentText -> Maybe DocumentText -> ContentReference -> Document

-- | The excerpt from the document.
[$sel:excerpt:Document'] :: Document -> Maybe DocumentText

-- | The title of the document.
[$sel:title:Document'] :: Document -> Maybe DocumentText

-- | A reference to the content resource.
[$sel:contentReference:Document'] :: Document -> ContentReference

-- | Create a value of <a>Document</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:excerpt:Document'</a>, <a>document_excerpt</a> - The excerpt
--   from the document.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:Document'</a>, <a>document_title</a> - The title of the
--   document.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contentReference:Document'</a>,
--   <a>document_contentReference</a> - A reference to the content
--   resource.
newDocument :: ContentReference -> Document

-- | The excerpt from the document.
document_excerpt :: Lens' Document (Maybe DocumentText)

-- | The title of the document.
document_title :: Lens' Document (Maybe DocumentText)

-- | A reference to the content resource.
document_contentReference :: Lens' Document ContentReference

-- | The text of the document.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDocumentText</a> smart constructor.
data DocumentText
DocumentText' :: Maybe (Sensitive Text) -> Maybe [Highlight] -> DocumentText

-- | Text in the document.
[$sel:text:DocumentText'] :: DocumentText -> Maybe (Sensitive Text)

-- | Highlights in the document text.
[$sel:highlights:DocumentText'] :: DocumentText -> Maybe [Highlight]

-- | Create a value of <a>DocumentText</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:text:DocumentText'</a>, <a>documentText_text</a> - Text in the
--   document.
--   
--   <a>$sel:highlights:DocumentText'</a>, <a>documentText_highlights</a> -
--   Highlights in the document text.
newDocumentText :: DocumentText

-- | Text in the document.
documentText_text :: Lens' DocumentText (Maybe Text)

-- | Highlights in the document text.
documentText_highlights :: Lens' DocumentText (Maybe [Highlight])

-- | A search filter.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFilter</a> smart constructor.
data Filter
Filter' :: FilterField -> FilterOperator -> Text -> Filter

-- | The field on which to filter.
[$sel:field:Filter'] :: Filter -> FilterField

-- | The operator to use for comparing the field’s value with the provided
--   value.
[$sel:operator:Filter'] :: Filter -> FilterOperator

-- | The desired field value on which to filter.
[$sel:value:Filter'] :: Filter -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Filter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:field:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_field</a> - The field on which to
--   filter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:operator:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_operator</a> - The operator to
--   use for comparing the field’s value with the provided value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_value</a> - The desired field
--   value on which to filter.
newFilter :: FilterField -> FilterOperator -> Text -> Filter

-- | The field on which to filter.
filter_field :: Lens' Filter FilterField

-- | The operator to use for comparing the field’s value with the provided
--   value.
filter_operator :: Lens' Filter FilterOperator

-- | The desired field value on which to filter.
filter_value :: Lens' Filter Text

-- | Offset specification to describe highlighting of document excerpts for
--   rendering search results and recommendations.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newHighlight</a> smart constructor.
data Highlight
Highlight' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Highlight

-- | The offset for the end of the highlight.
[$sel:endOffsetExclusive:Highlight'] :: Highlight -> Maybe Int

-- | The offset for the start of the highlight.
[$sel:beginOffsetInclusive:Highlight'] :: Highlight -> Maybe Int

-- | Create a value of <a>Highlight</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:endOffsetExclusive:Highlight'</a>,
--   <a>highlight_endOffsetExclusive</a> - The offset for the end of the
--   highlight.
--   
--   <a>$sel:beginOffsetInclusive:Highlight'</a>,
--   <a>highlight_beginOffsetInclusive</a> - The offset for the start of
--   the highlight.
newHighlight :: Highlight

-- | The offset for the end of the highlight.
highlight_endOffsetExclusive :: Lens' Highlight (Maybe Int)

-- | The offset for the start of the highlight.
highlight_beginOffsetInclusive :: Lens' Highlight (Maybe Int)

-- | Association information about the knowledge base.

--   <i>See:</i> <a>newKnowledgeBaseAssociationData</a> smart constructor.

--   identifier of the knowledge base.
newKnowledgeBaseAssociationData :: KnowledgeBaseAssociationData
